thread.title: Kendrick Lamar, The Weeknd, ASAP Rocky, and More Turn Up on Yams Day
thread.title_full: Kendrick Lamar, The Weeknd, ASAP Rocky, and More Turn Up on Yams Day

author: Joshua Espinoza
title: Kendrick Lamar, The Weeknd, ASAP Rocky, and More Turn Up on Yams Day
text:
— Rob Markman ( @RobMarkman ) January 19, 2017 Kendrick's TDE compatriot ScHoolboy Q was on hand as well. — Power 105.1 ( @Power1051 ) January 19, 2017 And, of course, what's a night of turn up music without French Montana? 
Yoooo @Frenchmontana just came out and turnt the building up! pic.twitter.com/ uURnF3a8cY — Power 105.1 ( @Power1051 ) January 19, 2017 But no matter how much fun was had, no one forgot for a second who the crowd had gathered together to honor. — The Hot Box™ ( @TheHotBox_Tv ) January 19, 2017 Prior to last year’s inaugural Yams Day , Rocky sat down with Hot 97 to discuss his expectations for the concert: “It’s all about everybody coming together, regardless of regions, blocks, backgrounds, groups. It’s about everybody spreading that love,” Rocky said . “I want to see ‘ 1 Train .’ […] I’m using that as an analogy. I want see that amongst hip-hop, but in the physical. Like sportsmanship, everybody just respecting each other as individual artists and appreciating each other.” Tags:
